title: We’ve created the product that will help your startup to look better.
description: Startup Framework contains components and complex blocks which can easily be integrated into almost any design. Responsive layout, clear grid, retina ready.

boxes.title: High Resolution
boxes.description: We did a 2.5K size high resolution photo that will suit even for a very large web site.

boxes.title: Easy to use
boxes.description: To get started, you select the desired sample and base the entire website on it. It’s that simple!

boxes.title: Feel our design
boxes.description: Samples will show you the feeling on how to play around using the components.
